rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: A quiet terminal lounge. Broken LED panels flicker with old welcome messages. The reception kiosk blinks idly. A long-forgotten message scrolls endlessly across the wall: `root@boot:/# access denied`.

[log-0x05]: CoreDaemon not responding... shutting it down manually.

lore.name: Melted I/O Port
lore.description: A deformed I/O socket. It's humming.

rooms.name: IT Wing
rooms.description: Rows of towering server racks, most dark. A faint burning smell. The hum of unstable power grows louder here. Red diodes pulse in irregular rhythm, like the heartbeat of a dying machine.

lore.name: Faulty Log Console
lore.description: A rusted terminal connected to rack node A-17. Its screen still glows faintly.
logs: [warn]: thermal breach threshold exceeded â€” rack_a17

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description: Crushed coffee pods, cracked mugs, and half-eaten snacks. A corkboard holds forgotten coupons and mysterious notes. The air tastes faintly of burnt caffeine and broken promises.

lore.description: A ragged pinboard with tacked-up memos, bug reports, and passive-aggressive snack policies.
logs: [sticky]: DO NOT feed SnackBot 3000 after midnight.
[scribble]: build agent 5 keeps failing, check USB port
[note]: remember to wipe logs from vending_ai

lore.name: SnackBot Core Dump
lore.description: A heat-damaged memory wafer. It's leaking crumbs and secrets.

rooms.name: Dev Dungeon
rooms.description: Dark and damp. Abandoned workstations run ancient builds. Shadowy figures hover over old commit logs. CRT monitors flicker with diff outputs from years ago.

exits.locked_msg: A terminal blocks the hallway. It wants proof of legacy build artifacts.

lore.name: Scroll of Forgotten Commits
lore.description: Printed diff logs from 2013 flutter in the server wind.
logs: [commit-0xBEEF]: rewrote feature toggle with XOR logic

lore.name: CRT Stack Output
lore.description: A tower of humming monitors, each showing the same message.
logs: [diagnostic]: sudo token locked until spectral anomaly resolved

rooms.name: Cold Storage
rooms.description: Frost clings to the server enclosures. Legacy tapes and sealed drives sit silently. Everything smells like old bytes.

exits.locked_msg: [LOCKED SECTOR] Requires restored credentials to proceed.

lore.name: Chamber Log Terminal
lore.description: A terminal locked in a layer of frost. Its log buffer flickers weakly.
logs: [backup.0x02]: AI model integrity compromised. Redundant sealing in effect.
[backup.0x03]: DO NOT mount without proper credentials.
[user.log]: luna//admin marked this for manual override.

lore.name: Archival Manifest
lore.description: A paper printout duct-taped to the mainframe door.

rooms.name: Power Plant
rooms.description: Arcs of electricity snap between busbars. The main generator whirs with fluctuating intensity. A shadow shifts in the sparks.

exits.locked_msg: [ACCESS DENIED] Emergency breaker locked until main threat eliminated.

lore.name: Generator Control Schematic
lore.description: A charred printout pinned under a screwdriver. It's half-legible.
logs: [kernel_0x12]: anomaly loop active â€” monitor shutdown request ignored.
[annotated by technician]: 'check the relay near east hall â€” we lost sync there'

lore.name: Breaker Panel Diagnostics
lore.description: A CRT monitor displays looping error codes from the breaker.

[note]: physical override possible from East Sector switch room.

rooms.name: The DMZ
rooms.description: A glowing mesh of network firewalls, routing tables, and traffic shaping daemons. The air smells like scorched JSON.

exits.locked_msg: [FIREWALL ALERT] Unauthorized packet detected. Inject rule exception to proceed.
[ACCESS DENIED] Unauthorized entry. ARC Badge required.

rooms.name: DataCore
rooms.description: Everything is quiet. The CoreRouter floats mid-air, humming like a heart. Cables hang like neural pathways. Old Root waits.

[advisory]: User input required. Final decision path unresolved.

enemies.name: Overheating Server
enemies.description: A half-melted 2U rack unit throwing sparks and screaming in syslogs.

enemies.name: Syslog Wraith
enemies.description: A ghostly figure formed from corrupted log entries. It howls in regex.

enemies.name: CI Specter
enemies.description: An endless ghost loop of failing builds, haunting DevOps for eternity.

enemies.name: Recursive Fault
enemies.description: A self-replicating bug frozen in debugger stasis. It crashes reality.

enemies.name: Kernel Panik

enemies.description: It routes all hope to /dev/null. Its ports bend light.

enemies.name: CoreDaemon

enemies.name: Quarantine Ghost

npcs.name: GhostAdmin

quests.name: Fix the IT Disaster
quests.description: Something's burning in the racks again. Clara needs it contained.

steps.description: Report to Clara in the Lobby

quests.name: Obtain the Sudo Token
quests.description: The loop won't end. DevGhost42 has the key, but he's holding it hostage.

quests.name: Restore Backup Access
quests.description: Storage integrity lost. Luna marked a manual path. Recover the frozen keys.

quests.name: Restart the Power Plant
quests.description: The core loop destabilized. Kernel Panik must be eliminated. Reroute the relay.

quests.name: Gain DMZ Clearance
quests.description: ARC Agent controls the uplink. Get his trust. Get the badge.

quests.name: Activate the CoreRouter
quests.description: The daemon still pulses. The root still speaks. End it. Or loop again.
